# lcod://tooling/array/concat@0.1.0

Concatenate two arrays, falling back to empty arrays when inputs are missing.

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `left` | array | No | Base array (non-arrays are treated as empty). |
| `right` | array | No | Array to append (non-arrays are treated as empty). |

## Outputs

| Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `items` | array | Concatenated array. |
